Changelog
=========

0.1.5 (28.07.2023)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  * Updated Wagtail imports to work with Wagtail > 4

0.1.4 (29.01.2023)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  * Updated Django url imports to be constantly from django.urls

0.1.3 (08.07.2022)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  * Implemented cleaner solution of Django versions with compat

0.1.1 (05.07.2022)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  * Added checks for Django version methods

0.1 (04.07.2022)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  * Change deprecated ugettext_lazy, ugettext and ungettext methods in Django 4 to respective new substitutes


(02.05.2018)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  * Original release from Torchbox
